requirements.summary: Convert header logo to 3D rendered element using Three.js and React Three Fiber with metallic chrome appearance and rotating animation
acceptanceCriteria: Logo in header is rendered as a 3D Three.js scene
3D logo maintains the circular winged emblem design from the uploaded image
Logo rotates smoothly on the Y-axis
3D logo is responsive and scales appropriately with the header

file_operations.description: Add Three.js, React Three Fiber (@react-three/fiber), and React Three Drei (@react-three/drei) dependencies to support 3D rendering capabilities

Create a 3D logo component using React Three Fiber that renders the circular winged emblem design from frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_200x200.png as a texture on a 3D geometry with metallic/chrome MeshStandardMaterial and continuous Y-axis rotation animation using useFrame hook
Replace the static logo image element with the Logo3D component, wrapping it in a Canvas from @react-three/fiber with appropriate sizing to maintain the header layout and responsive design

requirements.summary: Convert bike cards to 3D motorcycle models using Three.js and React Three Fiber with interactive rotation on hover
acceptanceCriteria: Each bike card displays a 3D motorcycle model instead of a static image
3D models are styled to match the bike types (sport bikes with appropriate colors: red, black, white)
Users can rotate the 3D bike models by hovering or dragging
3D models load performantly without blocking the UI
Bike specifications and pricing remain visible below the 3D model
3D scenes maintain aspect ratio and responsiveness across screen sizes

file_operations.description: Create a 3D motorcycle model component using React Three Fiber that renders a sport bike geometry with color prop (red, black, or white) applied to MeshStandardMaterial, includes OrbitControls from @react-three/drei for interactive rotation, uses Suspense with fallback for progressive loading, and references the generated bike images (frontend/public/assets/generated/bike-red-sport.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/bike-black-sport.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/bike-white-sport.dim_800x600.png) as texture references

Replace the static bike image with BikeModel3D component wrapped in Canvas from @react-three/fiber, passing appropriate color prop based on bike data, maintain existing specifications and pricing layout below the 3D scene, and ensure the Canvas maintains aspect ratio and responsiveness

Add a color field to the Bike interface and update each bike object with corresponding color values (red for Red Thunder Sport, black for Black Phantom Elite, white for White Lightning Pro) to drive the 3D model appearance
